These include enhancing biological anthropogenic sinks of CO2 and using chemical engineering to
achieve long-term removal and storage. Carbon capture and storage (CCS) from industrial and
energy-related sources, which alone does not remove CO2 from the atmosphere, can remove
atmospheric CO2 if combined with bioenergy production (Bioenergy with Carbon Capture &
Storage â€“ BECCS). Removals can be subject to reversals, which are movements of stored GHG out
